doc: Example Asset Pipeline module. The 'module-name' needs to be unique among all module files.

config.doc: Overriding selected directories for testing purposes. Rest of config defaults to world.module.json.

cache-options.doc: All we need to specify is the URL source and the filter profile; no advanced config.

config.doc: Note the file name is a .png. The file will be converted from .jpg by the filters.

options.doc: Since we are using the default loader and no other options, we don't actually need the options section at all.

textures.doc: The resource-name value should be unique. It is used to specify the resource in the layouts.

cache-options.doc: NOTE: The filter profile 'ArtJpg' is defined in the world.module.json file.

config.doc: The file name is the name used in the cache and may be different than the source name.

resources.doc: This example specifies only textures resources. (You can leave the 'materials' and 'objects' sections out.)
